---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/staking/get-flow-status-completed
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/2fdfccac-ca61-4b10-973b-4252567fe019' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegate_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "2fdfccac-ca61-4b10-973b-4252567fe019",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "cosmos1vyl8vkkr68ftda8gcp7kwh8h9g7hmzv4wjt6g5",
    "validator_address": "cosmosvaloper1tflk30mq5vgqjdly92kkhhq3raev2hnz6eete3",
    "amount": "2.0",
    "memo": null,
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": null,
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "7011E72B9B02935F273736C66D5B47674574C9BC74C1FEED08E942123AC8BE83",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-31T22:27:24.852Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-31T22:31:43.731Z"
}
```

### Token Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully delegated your ATOM tokens. Your stake is now active and earning rewards.
